activities.name: update data facEnd Process Move file sync Error

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''Unable to move the file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileSyncName,'''',
	' WHERE DATA_ID =',pipeline().parameters.dataId,';')

activities.name: update data fac End Process Move file dat Error

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E'',',
	' DESCRIPTION = ''Unable to move the file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileSyncName,'''',
	' WHERE DATA_ID =',pipeline().parameters.dataId,';')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('Datafactories Exception : ',activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').Error),0,if(greater(length(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').Error),499),499,length(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').Error))),'''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT ROW_ID AS OLD_COUNT FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_SCORE_VALUE WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND PROCESS_TYPE = ''09''')

text.value:
@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_SCORE_VALUE
    SET PROCESS_TYPE = ''09|',activity('SELECT old 09').output.firstrow.OLD_COUNT,'''
    ,ROW_ID = NULL 
    WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND PROCESS_TYPE = ''09''')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''S'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''Process file name : ',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,' total count ',string(add(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').output.rowsRead,1)),' record -> count process ',string(sub(activity('Copy data to CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL').output.rowsRead,1)),' record.''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

@concat('WITH SCORE AS (SELECT * FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_SCORE_VALUE WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND CL_LEVEL = ''BA'' AND PROCESS_TYPE LIKE ''02%'')
MERGE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE AS TARGET
USING SCORE AS SOURCE
ON (TARGET.ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.ACCNT_ID)
WHEN MATCHED AND TARGET.BILLING_ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID 
THEN 
UPDATE
SET
 TARGET.REF_ROW_ID = SOURCE.ROW_ID ,
 TARGET.CREATED = SOURCE.CREATED ,
 TARGET.CREATED_BY = SOURCE. CREATED_BY,
 TARGET.LAST_UPD = SOURCE.LAST_UPD ,
 TARGET.LAST_UPD_BY = SOURCE.LAST_UPD_BY,
 TARGET.ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.ACCNT_ID ,
 TARGET.BILLING_ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
 TARGET.ACCNT_NO = SOURCE.ACCNT_NO ,
 TARGET.CL_LEVEL = SOURCE.CL_LEVEL ,
 TARGET.SCORE_RANGE = SOURCE.SCORE_RANGE,
 TARGET.CL_TYPE = SOURCE.CL_TYPE ,
 TARGET.CL_CHANGE_REASON = SOURCE.CL_CHANGE_REASON,
 TARGET.OUTCOME_CD = SOURCE.OUTCOME_CD,
 TARGET.OUTCOME_REASON = SOURCE.OUTCOME_REASON,
 TARGET.CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.PREV_SCORE_RANGE = SOURCE.PREV_SCORE_RANGE,
 TARGET.ACTUAL = SOURCE.ACTUAL,
 TARGET.ACTUAL_PERM = SOURCE.ACTUAL_PERM,
 TARGET.BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 TARGET.BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID ,
 TARGET.FBB_FLAG = SOURCE.FBB_FLAG ,
 TARGET.LAST_REVIEW_DAT = SOURCE.LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,
 TARGET.MIN_REVIEW = SOURCE.MIN_REVIEW ,
 TARGET.AVAILABLE_CREDIT = SOURCE.AVAILABLE_CREDIT ,
 TARGET.PAYMENT_FLG = SOURCE.PAYMENT_FLG ,
 TARGET.BA_REGISTER_DT = SOURCE.BA_REGISTER_DT
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (REF_ROW_ID ,
 CREATED ,
 CREATED_BY ,
 LAST_UPD ,
 LAST_UPD_BY ,
 ACCNT_ID ,
 BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,
 ACCNT_NO ,
 CL_LEVEL ,
 SCORE_RANGE ,
 CL_TYPE ,
 CL_CHANGE_REASON ,
 OUTCOME_CD ,
 OUTCOME_REASON ,
 CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 PREV_SCORE_RANGE ,
 ACTUAL ,
 ACTUAL_PERM ,
 BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID ,
 FBB_FLAG ,
 LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,
 MIN_REVIEW ,
 AVAILABLE_CREDIT ,
 PAYMENT_FLG ,
 BA_REGISTER_DT ) VALUES (SOURCE.ROW_ID ,
 SOURCE.CREATED ,
 SOURCE. CREATED_BY,
 SOURCE.LAST_UPD ,
 SOURCE.LAST_UPD_BY,
 SOURCE.ACCNT_ID ,
 SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
 SOURCE.ACCNT_NO ,
 SOURCE.CL_LEVEL ,
 SOURCE.SCORE_RANGE,
 SOURCE.CL_TYPE ,
 SOURCE.CL_CHANGE_REASON,
 SOURCE.OUTCOME_CD,
 SOURCE.OUTCOME_REASON,
 SOURCE.CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.PREV_SCORE_RANGE,
 SOURCE.ACTUAL,
 SOURCE.ACTUAL_PERM,
 SOURCE.BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 SOURCE.BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID ,
 SOURCE.FBB_FLAG ,
 SOURCE.LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,
 SOURCE.MIN_REVIEW ,
 SOURCE.AVAILABLE_CREDIT ,
 SOURCE.PAYMENT_FLG ,
 SOURCE.BA_REGISTER_DT);')

@concat('WITH SCORE AS (SELECT * FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_SCORE_VALUE WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,' AND CL_LEVEL = ''CA'' AND PROCESS_TYPE LIKE ''02%'' ORDER BY DATA_SCORE_ID ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS)
MERGE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_VALUE AS TARGET
USING SCORE AS SOURCE
ON (TARGET.ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.ACCNT_ID)
WHEN MATCHED 
THEN 
UPDATE
SET
 TARGET.REF_ROW_ID = SOURCE.ROW_ID ,
 TARGET.CREATED = SOURCE.CREATED ,
 TARGET.CREATED_BY = SOURCE. CREATED_BY,
 TARGET.LAST_UPD = SOURCE.LAST_UPD ,
 TARGET.LAST_UPD_BY = SOURCE.LAST_UPD_BY,
 TARGET.ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.ACCNT_ID ,
 TARGET.BILLING_ACCNT_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
 TARGET.ACCNT_NO = SOURCE.ACCNT_NO ,
 TARGET.CL_LEVEL = SOURCE.CL_LEVEL ,
 TARGET.SCORE_RANGE = SOURCE.SCORE_RANGE,
 TARGET.CL_TYPE = SOURCE.CL_TYPE ,
 TARGET.CL_CHANGE_REASON = SOURCE.CL_CHANGE_REASON,
 TARGET.OUTCOME_CD = SOURCE.OUTCOME_CD,
 TARGET.OUTCOME_REASON = SOURCE.OUTCOME_REASON,
 TARGET.CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 TARGET.PREV_SCORE_RANGE = SOURCE.PREV_SCORE_RANGE,
 TARGET.ACTUAL = SOURCE.ACTUAL,
 TARGET.ACTUAL_PERM = SOURCE.ACTUAL_PERM,
 TARGET.BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT = SOURCE.BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 TARGET.BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID = SOURCE.BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID ,
 TARGET.FBB_FLAG = SOURCE.FBB_FLAG ,
 TARGET.LAST_REVIEW_DAT = SOURCE.LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,
 TARGET.MIN_REVIEW = SOURCE.MIN_REVIEW ,
 TARGET.AVAILABLE_CREDIT = SOURCE.AVAILABLE_CREDIT ,
 TARGET.PAYMENT_FLG = SOURCE.PAYMENT_FLG ,
 TARGET.BA_REGISTER_DT = SOURCE.BA_REGISTER_DT
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET 
THEN INSERT (REF_ROW_ID ,
 CREATED ,
 CREATED_BY ,
 LAST_UPD ,
 LAST_UPD_BY ,
 ACCNT_ID ,
 BILLING_ACCNT_ID ,
 ACCNT_NO ,
 CL_LEVEL ,
 SCORE_RANGE ,
 CL_TYPE ,
 CL_CHANGE_REASON ,
 OUTCOME_CD ,
 OUTCOME_REASON ,
 CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 PREV_SCORE_RANGE ,
 ACTUAL ,
 ACTUAL_PERM ,
 BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID ,
 FBB_FLAG ,
 LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,
 MIN_REVIEW ,
 AVAILABLE_CREDIT ,
 PAYMENT_FLG ,
 BA_REGISTER_DT ) VALUES (SOURCE.ROW_ID ,
 SOURCE.CREATED ,
 SOURCE. CREATED_BY,
 SOURCE.LAST_UPD ,
 SOURCE.LAST_UPD_BY,
 SOURCE.ACCNT_ID ,
 SOURCE.BILLING_ACCNT_ID,
 SOURCE.ACCNT_NO ,
 SOURCE.CL_LEVEL ,
 SOURCE.SCORE_RANGE,
 SOURCE.CL_TYPE ,
 SOURCE.CL_CHANGE_REASON,
 SOURCE.OUTCOME_CD,
 SOURCE.OUTCOME_REASON,
 SOURCE.CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT,
 SOURCE.PREV_SCORE_RANGE,
 SOURCE.ACTUAL,
 SOURCE.ACTUAL_PERM,
 SOURCE.BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT ,
 SOURCE.BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID ,
 SOURCE.FBB_FLAG ,
 SOURCE.LAST_REVIEW_DAT ,
 SOURCE.MIN_REVIEW ,
 SOURCE.AVAILABLE_CREDIT ,
 SOURCE.PAYMENT_FLG ,
 SOURCE.BA_REGISTER_DT);')

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('Datafactories Exception : ',activity('Merge ca To cc_scorevalue').Error),0,if(greater(length(activity('Merge ca To cc_scorevalue').Error),499),499,length(activity('Merge ca To cc_scorevalue').Error))),'''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

@concat('UPDATE ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY
    SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	LAST_UPD_BY =''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	STATUS = ''E'',
	FILE_NAME = ''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	DESCRIPTION = ''',substring(concat('Datafactories Exception : ',activity('Merge Ba To cc_scorevalue').Error),0,if(greater(length(activity('Merge Ba To cc_scorevalue').Error),499),499,length(activity('Merge Ba To cc_scorevalue').Error))),'''
	WHERE DATA_ID = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId)

@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_SCORE_REQUEST(REF_ROW_ID,CREATED,CREATED_BY,LAST_UPD,LAST_UPD_BY,ACCNT_ID,BILLING_ACCNT_ID,CL_LEVEL,
SCORE_RANGE,CL_TYPE,CL_CHANGE_REASON,OUTCOME_CD,OUTCOME_REASON,CREDIT_LIMIT,PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT,
TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT,PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT,PREV_SCORE_RANGE,ACTUAL,ACTUAL_PERM,BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT,
BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID,FBB_FLAG,LAST_REVIEW_DAT,MIN_REVIEW,STATUS_CD,PROFILE_COMPLETE_FLG)
SELECT CONCAT(''SV_ID-'',ROW_ID) AS ROW_ID,CREATED,CREATED_BY,LAST_UPD,LAST_UPD_BY,ACCNT_ID,BILLING_ACCNT_ID,CL_LEVEL,
SCORE_RANGE,CL_TYPE,CL_CHANGE_REASON,OUTCOME_CD,OUTCOME_REASON,CREDIT_LIMIT,PERM_CREDIT_LIMIT,
TEMP_CREDIT_LIMIT,PREV_CREDIT_LIMIT,PREV_SCORE_RANGE,ACTUAL,ACTUAL_PERM,BILLING_CREDIT_LIMIT,
BILLING_THRESHOLD_SET_ID,FBB_FLAG,LAST_REVIEW_DAT,MIN_REVIEW,''Completed'' AS STATUS_CD,PROFILE_COMPLETE_FLG 
FROM ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_DATA_FACTORY_SCORE_VALUE WHERE PROCESS_TYPE = ''02'' AND DATA_ID  = ',pipeline().parameters.dataId,'
ORDER BY CREATED ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS')
